spell_tooltip.description: Increases Item Level by 5 and increases the potency of all Azerite powers granted by this item.
When you take damage, heal for 13,535. Cannot occur more than once every 6 sec.
Your heals on targets below 50% health have a chance to heal for an additional 14,070.
For 10 sec after you cast Holy Word: Serenity, Heal and Flash Heal heal for an additional 3,165, and reduce the cooldown of Holy Word: Serenity by an additional 1 sec.
Echo of Light from Holy Word: Sanctify heals for an additional 9,496.

equipped_items.name: Heart of Azeroth

main_spell_tooltip.description:
Blast your target with a ball of concentrated flame, dealing 21,673 Fire damage to an enemy or healing an ally for 21,673, then burn the target for an additional 75% of the damage or healing done over 6 sec.

Each cast of Concentrated Flame deals 100% increased damage or healing. This bonus resets after every third cast.
Max 2 Charges.

passive_spell_tooltip.description: Your spells and abilities have a chance to cauterize your target for 12,542 Fire damage over 10 sec or to heal an ally for 12,542 over 10 sec, stacking up to 5 times.

Every 10 sec, allies within 15 yds gain a shield that absorbs 2,481 damage, stacking up to 18,609.

Unique:  Corruption Resistance increased by 10.

Every 5 sec, gain Devout Spirit, causing your next Flash Heal to heal for an additional 3,157, stacking up to 3 times.

Unique: Corruption Resistance increased by 10.

Your heals have a very high chance to implant a Seed of Eonar in the target for 18 sec.

Seed of Eonar
If the target takes damage, the Seed bursts, healing them for 8,972.

spells.description: Equip: Harnesses the energy of raw Azerite, awakening exceptional pieces of armor that possess latent powers.

equipped_items.description: A living symbol of hope, borne by the champions of a dying planet. The fate of Azeroth will be shared by all her children.

spell_tooltip.description: Increases Item Level by 5 and increases the potency of all Azerite powers granted by this item.
Every 30 sec, gain an absorb shield for 38,671 for 30 sec.
Your healing effects have a chance to grant the target 282 additional healing every 2 sec for 12 sec. This effect doubles every 2 sec.
For 10 sec after you cast Holy Word: Serenity, Heal and Flash Heal heal for an additional 3,165, and reduce the cooldown of Holy Word: Serenity by an additional 1 sec.
Prayer of Mending heals for an additional 1,207 and reduces Holy Word: Sanctify's cooldown by 2 sec.

equipped_items.name: Irradiated Undercoat

spells.description: Equip: Chance on hit to draw Unstable Isotopes from any Irradiated Elemental or Contaminated Glob.

Use: Absorb 100 Unstable Isotopes, increasing threat generation by 20%, Nature damage taken by 5%, and periodically heals the caster for 1% to 5% per 6 sec for 30 min.

Only usable on Mechagon Island. (1 Day Cooldown)

equipped_items.description: The metal links have a slight green glow to them. Wearing it cannot possibly be good for you.

spell_tooltip.description: Increases Item Level by 5 and increases the potency of all Azerite powers granted by this item.
Every 30 sec, gain an absorb shield for 38,671 for 30 sec.
Your heals have a chance to apply Bracing Chill. Healing a target with Bracing Chill will heal for an additional 7,740 and move Bracing Chill to a nearby ally (up to 6 times).
Flash Heal increases the healing of your Flash Heals on that ally by 3,971 for 6 sec.
For 10 sec after you cast Holy Word: Serenity, Heal and Flash Heal heal for an additional 3,165, and reduce the cooldown of Holy Word: Serenity by an additional 1 sec.

spells.description: Equip: Gain Void Ritual, giving your spells and abilities a chance to increase all secondary stats by 14 every sec for 20 sec. This chance is increased if at least 2 nearby allies also have Void Ritual.
Equip: Increases the amount of Haste you gain from all sources by 6%.

Use: Increase your Critical Strike by up to 1,441, reduced by 115 for each ally within 8 yards of you. Lasts 10 sec. When this effect ends, your Versatility is increased by 288 for each ally within 5 yards of you, up to a max of 1,440. Lasts 10 sec.
 (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)
Equip: The radius of the second half of the Manifesto is increased by 1 yard based on the power of your Ashjra'kamas, Shroud of Resolve.

Equip: Your healing spells have a chance to conjure a sanguine pool near your location, containing 63,234 healing. While standing within the pool, your healing spells restore 3,162 additional health, until the pool is depleted.
Equip: Reduce Sanity loss within the Visions of N'Zoth by 40%.
Use: Dispel any effects of N'Zoth's Corruption, and become immune to any further Corruption effects for 6 sec. (3 Min Cooldown)
Equip: You champion the causes of your guild.  All guild reputation gains are increased by 100%.
